LDAP Settings Help

LDAP Configuration Settings

The system defaults to LOCAL mode where it only uses internal database for validation. Sliding the toggle button from LOCAL to LDAP will enable integration with an existing LDAP server. Fill in all the options to configure connection.



Mapping Fields from Modis Lock to LDAP Data

Mapping fields are used to match your Modis Lock's internal data with LDAP data fields.

Be sure to save any changes by clicking the save button on the bottom of the page.
